question: Laxman Nayak, led the Quit India movement of Odisha in which District?
explanation: Responding to the call of Mahatma Gandhi Laxman Naik led the movement in Koraput district by organizing an army of 200 men. Later he was arrested and sent to Berhampore Jail. His execution took place on 29<sup>th</sup> March 1943.
